career.title: Iziko Lophuhliso Lomsebenzi
career.subtitle: Iindlela ezicwangcisiweyo zobunkokeli bosapho, ubugcisa bokusebenza, kunye nempembelelo yoshishino ngaphakathi kwi-Salatiso ecosystem.

learning.title: I-Sazi Life Academy Hub
learning.subtitle: Amava okufunda akhethiweyo okuphuhlisa ubunkokeli bosapho, ubugcisa boshishino, kunye nempembelelo yoluntu.

timeline.title: Ixesha Lokuphumeza
timeline.subtitle: Landela isigqibo sokukhulisa usapho. Isigaba ngasinye sidibana nokusebenza, ukufunda kunye namanqanaba eentsomiâ€”azinze kwiinqobo ze-Ubuntu kunye neenjongo zoshishino.

lifecv.title: Iziko Lokuqondwa Le-LifeCV
lifecv.subtitle: I-LifeCV lirekhodi eliphilayo lobunkokeli belungu ngalunye losapho, impembelelo yoshishino, kunye nenkonzo yoluntu. Yigcine isemgangathweni ukuze uvule ukuqondwa, izikhutshelo zokufunda, kunye neendlela zemali.

ecosystem.title: Izicelo Ze-Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Umqolo wedijithali odityanisiweyo oxhasa amashishini osapho, iinkqubo zoluntu, kunye neendlela zokusebenza zolawulo lwe-Ubuntu.

testing.title: Indawo Yovavanyo
testing.subtitle: Nceda ukuphucula iinkqubo zethu ngokunika ingxelo yexabiso
testing.description: Khetha isikhokelo sovavanyo esifanelekileyo ngokusekelwe kwiqonga olivavanyayo. Isikhokelo ngasinye siquka imiyalelo yenyathelo ngenyathelo kunye neefom zengxelo.
testing.contribute_description: Ingxelo yakho inegalelo ngqo ekwakheni izixhobo ezingcono zoosomashishini baseMzantsi Afrika kunye neentsapho

templates.title: Ithala Leencwadi Leetemplates
templates.subtitle: Iitemplates zeshishini zobuchule kwisigaba ngasinye sohambo lwakho
templates.description: Khangela kwaye ulayishe iitemplates zeshishini ze-Personal, Professional, Family, kunye ne-QuickStart use.
templates.name: Igama
templates.custom_description: Awuboniyo ofuna ukukufumana? Singenza iitemplates ezenziwe ngokwezifiso ezilungele iimfuno zakho zeshishini.

homepage.hero_description: I-Mlandeli Notemba Investments yinkampani yosapho ephethe i-ecosystem ye-Salatiso - igcina i-Sazi Life Academy, i-Homestead OS, i-LifeKey, kunye namalungelo awodwa olindileyo anika amandla kwilifa lethu lezizukulwana ezininzi.
homepage.hero_subtext: Okuqale njengeencwadi kunye namanqaku e-Salatiso.com ngoku kuphila njenge-intranet yosapho, i-academy yokufunda, kunye neqonga elilungele abalingane elibuyisela ibali lomntu ngamnye ekhaya phantsi kolawulo lwe-MNI.
homepage.ubuntu_description: Isiseko sethu sakhiwe kwifilosofi ye-Ubuntu - inkolelo yokuba ubuntu bethu bunxibelelene kwaye sifezekisa amandla ethu apheleleyo ngoluntu kunye nenkxaso yomntu nomntu.
homepage.family_description: Sonke isigqibo, imveliso, kunye nentsebenziswano ibeka phambili impumelelo yosapho kunye nokwakha ilifa lezizukulwana ezininzi.
homepage.innovation_description: Sisebenzisa itekhnoloji yamaxesha anzima ukusombulula iingxaki zokwenyani kwiintsapho kunye noluntu kulo lonke elaseMzantsi Afrika.
homepage.impact_description: Amashishini ethu ayilelwe ukudala utshintsho oluqinisekileyo olunokulinganiswa kwimfundo, ukuxhotyiswa kwezoqoqosho, kunye nophuhliso loluntu.
